physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a colonial-style Government House in Singapore. The photograph features a side-view of the large building. The ground level of the building is made of rounded archways
 while the higher level of the building is outlined with tall columns. The foreground of the photograph shows the grounds of the building
 with several trees. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

The ground level of the building is made of rounded archways, while the higher level of the building is outlined with tall columns. The foreground of the photograph shows the grounds of the building, with several trees. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
